Class oracle.html.OrderedList 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item

           +----oracle.html.CompoundItem
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.List
                           |
                           +----oracle.html.OrderedList
public class OrderedList
extends List
Description:

OrderedList encapsulates an OL list element in HTML

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you want to present the user with a list of items in an ordered manner.

Example: 

// Create an Ordered List
OrderedList ol = new OrderedList();
ol.addItem(new SimpleItem("Ordered1"));
ol.addItem(new SimpleItem("Ordered2"));
ol.addItem(new SimpleItem("Ordered3"));

See Also:
Item, List

endTag()
Return the end Tag for this item
startTag()
Return the start Tag of this item
